WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi,

We are closing this work item in order to unify the votes and comments in an existing work item portraying the same issue:
 - SL3 caching not working with Modules (http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/workitem/4730)

For those interested, in the aforementioned work item you can find an approach to work around this problem.

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
WorkItem.Description: If you use XAP reduction feature, some dlls are excluded from your XAP file  to be loaded on-demand. Current implementation of Silverlight ModuleTypeLoader load only assemblies from XAP file and ignore stored as zip files in ClientBin folder.
WorkItem.Summary: ModuleTypeLoader doesn't support reduced XAP files
